text: Blonay was a municipality in Riviera-Pays-d'Enhaut in the canton of Vaud in Switzerland. On 1 January 2022, the former municipalities of Blonay and Saint- Légier-La Chiésaz merged to form the new municipality of Blonay – Saint- Légier. == References == == Other websites == * The website of Blonay Category:Former municipalities of Vaud
title: Blonay
